Anime Ninja Ultimate Pack (for Female)

 This bundle includes the following items: 
 • The Norika
 • Anime Ninja Shinobi Shozoku - Black (for Female)
 • Anime Ninja Kunai and Gloves - Black (for Female)
 • Anime Ninja Jika-tabi Boots - Black (for Female)
 • Anime Ninja Animation Pack (for Female)
 • LMO - Anime Ninja Dash
 Live your life as a noble Ninja or just cosplay for fun. [#Legal]

 • Jika-tabi ninja Anime - Noirs (pour femme)
